Package ipp.estg.utils

Class FileUtils<T>

java.lang.Object
ipp.estg.utils.FileUtils<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of objects to be handled in the file operations.
public class FileUtils<T> extends Object
Utility class for reading and writing object lists to and from files. This class provides methods to read a list of objects from a file and write a list of objects to a file.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    FileUtils(String filePath)
    Constructs a FileUtils object for a specified file path.

    Description

    Reads a list of objects from a file.

  • Constructor Details

    • FileUtils

      public FileUtils(String filePath)
      Constructs a FileUtils object for a specified file path.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the file where the object list will be read from or written to.

  • Method Details

    • readObjectListFromFile

      public List<T> readObjectListFromFile()
      Reads a list of objects from a file. The objects are deserialized from the file and returned as a list. If an error occurs during reading, an empty list is returned.
      Returns:
      A list of objects read from the file. Returns an empty list if the file cannot be read.

    • writeObjectListToFile

      public boolean writeObjectListToFile(List<T> records) throws CannotWritetoFileException
      Writes a list of objects to a file. The objects are serialized and written to the specified file path. If the file's parent directory doesn't exist, it is created.
      Parameters:
      records - The list of objects to write to the file.
      Returns:
      true if the objects were successfully written to the file.
      Throws:
      CannotWritetoFileException - If there is an error during the writing process.
